page.title: 12Religion Church Attendance
page.content: 27 families told us about their church life. Which church do you go to? 11. Shilbottle C.E. 2. St Paul's Catholic Church Alnwick. 1 St Michael's C.E. of Alnwick.13 do not go to church. Were you married in church? Yes 17 No 10. Have your children been christened? Yes 25 No 2. Have you any relatives buried in Shilbottle Church Yard? Yes 20 No 7. {Helen }Shilbottle Church The class went to Shilbottle Church Then we asked the Vicar questions. I asked him how many years he had been at that church.He said 2 years.24 people go on Sundays at 9 30. 7 people go to Sunday School.On Sunday evening 7 or 8 people come.In 1960 new slates were put on the roof.
